channel.title: NPC Attacking (Eating)
channel.description:
This is buggy, And on my Host ive got a few people asking about it..
When you attack an NPC, You cant eat, You have to move away then eat, If that dont work. You have to move away equip something else then eat.
Please help!??
Thanks!
